trendingDefinitions.slideDescription: [7-1b/6 Stroke Play Over 54 Holes on Consecutive Days; Second Round Canceled and Competitor Practices on Course Following Cancelation ,A "rub of the green" occurs when a ball in motion is accidentally deflected or stopped by anyoutside agency(seeRule 19-1)]
